attributes.action: Hold a referendum for the UK to rejoin the European Union
attributes.additional_details:
Save the country
Save our future and our childrens future
Don’t allow racist bigots to make such damaging decisions about our country that affect our finances and ultimately our quality of life
attributes.background:
Admit that to leave the EU was an arrogant thing to think and a foolish thing to do. Brexit is crippling the country and various key industries. 
Not to mention the high cost of living we are now told we must endure

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582432
